Visibility

# Visibility

On native, the Visibility class names map to `opacity` instead of `visibility`.

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class             | Support        |
| ----------------- | -------------- |
| ```
visible
```   | âœ… Full Support |
| ```
invisible
``` | âœ… Full Support |
| ```
collapse
```  | ğŸŒ Web only    |
